attributes.action: Answer the question that is put to him.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Prime Minister promised to use his Moral compass and to end the era of spin.  However, at every PMQs since he has taken over, and even in the media he has shown himself capable of dodging the most direct of question. We the undersigned do therefore petition this PM to answer the question that is put to him by Opposition MPs all of the time, not to dodge the question.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
